subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With David Beckham, Landon Donovan and Robbie Keane providing firepower as well as star power, the Galaxy thoroughly dominated the Dynamo to win the M.L.S. Cup.
snippet: With David Beckham, Landon Donovan and Robbie Keane providing firepower as well as star power, the Galaxy thoroughly dominated the Dynamo to win the M.L.S. Cup.
